verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph לָמָ֣ה <WH4100> why אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God זָנַ֣חְתָּ <WH2186> why hast thou cast [us] off לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> alway יֶעְשַׁ֥ן <WH6225> smoke אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <WH639> anger בְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> against the sheep מַרְעִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH4830> flock

זְכֹ֤ר <WH2142> Remember עֲדָתְךָ֨ ׀ <WH5712> thy congregation קָ֘נִ֤יתָ <WH7069> [which] thou hast purchased קֶּ֗דֶם <WH6924> of old גָּ֭אַלְתָּ <WH1350> [which] thou hast redeemed שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> the rod נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5159> of thine inheritance הַר־ <WH2022> this mount צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <WH6726> Zion זֶ֤ה ׀ <WH2088> this שָׁכַ֬נְתָּ <WH7931> wherein thou hast dwelt בּֽוֹ׃

הָרִ֣ימָה <WH7311> Lift up פְ֭עָמֶיךָ <WH6471> thy feet לְמַשֻּׁא֣וֹת <WH4876> desolations נֶ֑צַח <WH5331> unto the perpetual כָּל־ <WH3605> everything הֵרַ֖ע <WH7489> hath done wickedly אוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> [even] all [that] the enemy בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> in the sanctuary

שָׁאֲג֣וּ <WH7580> roar צֹ֭רְרֶיךָ <WH6887> Thine enemies בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in the midst מוֹעֲדֶ֑ךָ <WH4150> of thy congregations שָׂ֖מוּ <WH7760> they set up אוֹתֹתָ֣ם <WH226> their ensigns אֹתֽוֹת׃ <WH226> [for] signs
יִ֭וָּדַע <WH3045> [A man] was famous כְּמֵבִ֣יא <WH935> had lifted לְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> above בִּֽסֲבָךְ־ <WH5442> upon the thick עֵ֝֗ץ <WH6086> trees קַרְדֻּמּֽוֹת׃ <WH7134> axes

[וְעֵת כ] (וְ֭עַתָּה ק) פִּתּוּחֶ֣יהָ <WH6603> the carved work יָּ֑חַד <WH3162> thereof at once בְּכַשִּׁ֥יל <WH3781> with axes וְ֝כֵֽילַפֹּ֗ת <WH3597> and hammers יַהֲלֹמֽוּן׃ <WH1986> But now they break down

שִׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> They have cast בָ֭אֵשׁ <WH784> fire מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH4720> into thy sanctuary לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> to the ground חִלְּל֥וּ <WH2490> they have defiled מִֽשְׁכַּן־ <WH4908> [by casting down] the dwelling place שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> of thy name

אָמְר֣וּ <WH559> They said בְ֭לִבָּם <WH3820> in their hearts נִינָ֣ם <WH3238> Let us destroy יָ֑חַד <WH3162> them together שָׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> they have burned up כָל־ <WH3605> all מוֹעֲדֵי־ <WH4150> all the synagogues אֵ֣ל <WH410> of God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

אֽוֹתֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH226> not our signs לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor רָ֫אִ֥ינוּ <WH7200> We see אֵֽין־ <WH369> There ע֥וֹד <WH5750> longer נָבִ֑יא <WH5030> [there is] no more any prophet וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor אִ֝תָּ֗נוּ <WH854> among יֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> neither [is there] among us any that knoweth עַד־ <WH5704> how long מָֽה׃ <WH4100> how

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֣י <WH4970> How אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God יְחָ֣רֶף <WH2778> reproach צָ֑ר <WH6862> how long shall the adversary יְנָ֘אֵ֤ץ <WH5006> blaspheme אוֹיֵ֖ב <WH341> ? shall the enemy שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> thy name לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> alway

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> Why withdrawest יָ֭דְךָ <WH3027> thou thy hand וִֽימִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> your right מִקֶּ֖רֶב <WH7130> [it] out of [חֹוקְךָ כ] (חֵֽיקְךָ֣ <WH2436> bosom ק) כַלֵּֽה׃ <WH3615> destroy

וֵ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> For God מַלְכִּ֣י <WH4428> [is] my King מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> of old פֹּעֵ֥ל <WH6466> working יְ֝שׁוּע֗וֹת <WH3444> salvation בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You פוֹרַ֣רְתָּ <WH6565> Thou didst divide בְעָזְּךָ֣ <WH5797> by thy strength יָ֑ם <WH3220> the sea שִׁבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH7665> thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> the heads תַ֝נִּינִ֗ים <WH8577> of the dragons עַל־ <WH5921> in הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> in the waters

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You רִ֭צַּצְתָּ <WH7533> Thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> the heads לִוְיָתָ֑ן <WH3882> of leviathan תִּתְּנֶ֥נּוּ <WH5414> in pieces [and] gavest מַ֝אֲכָ֗ל <WH3978> him [to be] meat לְעָ֣ם <WH5971> to the people לְצִיִּֽים׃ <WH6728> inhabiting the wilderness

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You בָ֭קַעְתָּ <WH1234> Thou didst cleave מַעְיָ֣ן <WH4599> the fountain וָנָ֑חַל <WH5158> and the flood אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You ה֝וֹבַ֗שְׁתָּ <WH3001> thou driedst up נַהֲר֥וֹת <WH5104> rivers אֵיתָֽן׃ <WH386> mighty

לְךָ֣ י֭וֹם <WH3117> The day אַף־ <WH637> also לְךָ֥ לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> [is] thine the night אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You הֲ֝כִינ֗וֹתָ <WH3559> also [is] thine thou hast prepared מָא֥וֹר <WH3974> the light וָשָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> and the sun

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You הִ֭צַּבְתָּ <WH5324> Thou hast set כָּל־ <WH3605> all גְּבוּל֣וֹת <WH1367> all the borders אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth קַ֥יִץ <WH7019> summer וָ֝חֹ֗רֶף <WH2779> and winter אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You יְצַרְתָּם׃ <WH3335> thou hast made

זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise א֭וֹיֵב <WH341> this [that] the enemy חֵרֵ֣ף ׀ <WH2778> hath reproached יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD וְעַ֥ם <WH5971> people נָ֝בָ֗ל <WH5036> and [that] the foolish נִֽאֲצ֥וּ <WH5006> have blasphemed שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> O deliver לְ֭חַיַּת <WH2416> unto the multitude נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> not the soul תּוֹרֶ֑ךָ <WH8449> of thy turtledove חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> not the congregation עֲ֝נִיֶּ֗יךָ <WH6041> of thy poor אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> [of the wicked] forget לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> for ever

הַבֵּ֥ט <WH5027> Have respect לַבְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> unto the covenant כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> are full מַחֲשַׁכֵּי־ <WH4285> for the dark אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> places of the earth נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> of the habitations חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> of cruelty

אַל־ <WH408> nay יָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> return דַּ֣ךְ <WH1790> O let not the oppressed נִכְלָ֑ם <WH3637> ashamed עָנִ֥י <WH6041> let the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <WH34> and needy יְֽהַלְל֥וּ <WH1984> praise שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God רִיבָ֣ה <WH7378> plead רִיבֶ֑ךָ <WH7379> thine own cause זְכֹ֥ר <WH2142> remember חֶרְפָּתְךָ֥ <WH2781> reproacheth מִנִּי־ <WH4480> at נָ֝בָ֗ל <WH5036> how the foolish man כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> thee daily

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭שְׁכַּח <WH7911> Forget ק֣וֹל <WH6963> not the voice צֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <WH6887> of thine enemies שְׁא֥וֹן <WH7588> the tumult קָ֝מֶ֗יךָ <WH6965> of those that rise up עֹלֶ֥ה <WH5927> against thee increaseth תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually
